channel.title: Can anyone make a server handler that sends messages to the game?
channel.description: i need somthing that can send announcements and messages into my server so i can tell people stuff without being logged on. Thanx if anyone can ill make sure to credit you.. noobish about it either

item.title: Can anyone make a server handler that sends messages to the game?
item.dc:creator: @derrock derrock
item.description:
@derrock wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:3, topic:227354”][quote author=p e e p z i link=topic=298748.msg2399705#msg2399705 date=1219358789]
I don’t even think that’s possible… :rolleyes:
[/quote]
Yes it is… Use a JFrame.[/quote] WELL were do i get a jframe?

Read full topic
